attributes.description: All our vehicles undergo a Dekra Condition Report and an EXSTRA quality check at our workshop for that peace of mind motoring. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. Come and join our KIA N1 Family where trust and service are our main focus. We will tailor make a package that will suit you needs. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced and professional Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you here on our safe and spacious showroom. Contact the Kia Konfidence N1 TEAM NOW!
